channel.title: EasyRSC
channel.description:
Hello, I recently downloaded EasyRSC and haven't really done anything to it but when I go to run the server it just keeps saying that it cannot find or load the main class Server. This is the error after I compile though. I cannot make out what it says before I compiled because it kept closing too fast. Anyone have a fix for this? EDIT: This is the error I'm now getting after setting my environment variables for ant. [code]Buildfile: C:\Users\Main\Desktop\Server\build.xml
runserver: [java] java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadSection(WorldLoader.j ava:115) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.io.WorldLoader.loadWorld(WorldLoader.jav a:39) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.getWorld(World.java:83) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:29) [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-arg s constructor [java] ---- Debugging information ---- [java] message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.In vItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] line number : 3 [java] path : /linked-list-array/linked-list/InvItem [java] cause-message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.In vItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] class : [Ljava.util.LinkedList; [java] cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection .ObjectAccessException [java] required-type : org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem [java] ------------------------------- [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother (TreeUnmarshaller.java:45) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.co nvertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractColle ctionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionCon verter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:60) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionCon verter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:53) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother (TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.co nvertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractColle ctionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverte r.unmarshal(ArrayConverter.java:51) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother (TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.co nvertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.start(TreeUnma rshaller.java:99) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStra tegy.unmarshal(ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.java:12) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:552) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:540) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.PersistenceManager.load(Persistence Manager.java:41) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.entityhandling.EntityHandler.<clinit>(En tityHandler.java:340) [java] ... 4 more [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcce ssException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.server.model.InvItem as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.PureJavaReflec tionProvider.newInstance(PureJavaReflectionProvider.java:50) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConv erter.instantiateNewInstance(ReflectionConverter.java:148) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConv erter.unmarshal(ReflectionConverter.java:90) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother (TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] ... 21 more[/code]

item.title: EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @ReZGaming ReZGaming
item.description:
@ReZGaming wrote:

Hello,
I recently downloaded EasyRSC and haven’t really done anything to it but when I go to run the server it just keeps saying that it cannot find or load the main class Server.
This is the error after I compile though. I cannot make out what it says before I compiled because it kept closing too fast.
Anyone have a fix for this?
